documentation.text: Will check if the caller actually owns the vaultId passed in parameter
Will revert if amount is not bigger than 0
Deposit funds from the user to the contract, then the contract deposit the funds to the chosen Mai vault

Deposit the collateral from the contract to the Mai finance vault, this is only called after
the user has deposited the funds in the contract

Withdraw the collateral amount from the Mai vault calling withdrawFromVault(),
then sends the fund back to the user
Withdraw the collateral amount from the Mai vault to the contract, only called by the contract itself

The functions borrow the required amount of USDC to buy the chosen amount of collateral to long,
will repay the borrowed USDC by borrowing MAI from Mai finance's vault, the user ends up with a
long position and a debt in MAI
Credits to Abracadra finance for the idea

Reduce the long amount by doing another flash loan in USDC to buy the MAI required to repay the desired amount,
the contract will then withdraw the required collateral to repay the USDC debt

Borrow the required amount of MAI from the wanted Mai finance vault, only callable by
the contract
Repay the wanted amount of MAI from the user wallet to the chosen vault

Repay the debt amount in MAI, only callable by
the contract
Get all the vault Ids for the sender address
This function is called after the contract has received the flash loaned amount

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory,address,bytes memory,uint16) external

documentation.text: Get the minimum collateral percentage for this Mai vault type

This function will give the multiplicator maximum one user can long an asset
The result is given multiplied by 100 to keep 2 decimals precision, the caller needs to devide by 100

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,address[] memory) view external returns (uint256[] memory)

documentation.text: This function will return the minimum amount out from a swap

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,address[] memory) view external returns (uint256[] memory)

documentation.text: This function will return the minimum amount in for a swap

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,address[] memory) view external returns (uint256[] memory)

documentation.text: Returns an estimate of MAI amount to borrow to create a new long
This will return the max amount of collateral it is possible to withdraw with the current debt

Get the path for the 2 tokens passed in parameters, since we use Quickswap for the swaps,
will go through WMATIC token to create the swap
Get the vault index for the vault Id and sender address passed in parameters

The result is given multiplied by 100 to keep 2 decimals precision, the caller needs to devide by 100

documentation.text: This function will return the minimum amount out from a swap

documentation.text: Returns an estimate of MAI amount to borrow to create a new long
This will return the max amount of collateral it is possible to withdraw with the current debt

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit funds from the user to the contract, then the contract deposit the funds to the chosen Mai vault

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: This function is called after the contract has received the flash loaned amount

getAmountInMin(address,address,uint256).notice: This function will return the minimum amount in for a swap

getAmountOutMin(address,address,uint256).notice: This function will return the minimum amount out from a swap

getMAIDebtForAmount(uint256).notice: Returns an estimate of MAI amount to borrow to create a new long

getMaxWithdrawableCollateral(uint256).notice: This will return the max amount of collateral it is possible to withdraw with the current debt

getMinimumCollateralPercentage().notice: Get the minimum collateral percentage for this Mai vault type

getMultiplicatorMax100th().notice: This function will give the multiplicator maximum one user can long an asset The result is given multiplied by 100 to keep 2 decimals precision, the caller needs to devide by 100

getPathSwap(address,address).notice: Get the path for the 2 tokens passed in parameters, since we use Quickswap for the swaps, will go through WMATIC token to create the swap

getUserVaultList().notice: Get all the vault Ids for the sender address

longAsset(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: The functions borrow the required amount of USDC to buy the chosen amount of collateral to long, will repay the borrowed USDC by borrowing MAI from Mai finance's vault, the user ends up with a long position and a debt in MAI Credits to Abracadra finance for the idea

reduceLong(uint256,uint256).notice: Reduce the long amount by doing another flash loan in USDC to buy the MAI required to repay the desired amount, the contract will then withdraw the required collateral to repay the USDC debt

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Repay the wanted amount of MAI from the user wallet to the chosen vault

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw the collateral amount from the Mai vault calling withdrawFromVault(), then sends the fund back to the user
